overview: The Fans Have Spoken! is the series that launched Nick Manning Productions. In association with NickManning.com, porn's hottest male performer, Nick Manning, has brought his brand of raunchiness to new heights and lengths! The flurry of e-mails that Nick's received from You-The Fan, convinced him that you wanted to be heard. And he listened... Nick has changed the way porn is produced forever by letting you-The Fan, write and direct his scenes. You choose the partners, positions and backdrops, and Nick makes it happen.
title: Fans Have Spoken 2
